channel.title: Lkc The Return
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b]Lkc The Return[/b][/size][/center] [b]Base:[/b] Karmascape [b]Credits:[/b] I'm not sure who created Karmascape soo.. up for grabs.
[b]Why did I choose this server:[/b] I chose Karmascape, mainly because it was the server that I first started out with, Yes I know it's old.. But I love it :D
[b]Progress Log:[/b] Cleaned down the client.java to: 694kb (was around 900 I think..) Cleared around 50+ lines from the process
[b]To Do:[/b] Remove all the non-combat skills.
[b]Currently Doing:[/b] Creating a new trading system.

Credits: I’m not sure who created Karmascape soo… up for grabs.

Why did I choose this server: I chose Karmascape, mainly because it was the server that I first started out with, Yes I know it’s old… But I love it

Progress Log:
Cleaned down the client.java to: 694kb (was around 900 I think…)
Cleared around 50+ lines from the process
